abstract member CreateEffect : string -> Android.Media.Effect.Effect override this.CreateEffect : string -> Android.Media.Effect.Effect

Docs.param: The name of the effect to create.
Docs.summary: Instantiate a new effect with the given effect name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the effect with the specified name is not supported or not known.

tr.td: Float, between 0 and 1. Zero means no adjustment, while 1 indicates the maximum amount of adjustment.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: A URI for the background video to use. This parameter must be supplied before calling apply() for the first time.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: The value of the minimal pixel.
The value of the maximal pixel.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Positive float. 1.0 means no change; larger values will increase brightness.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Float. 1.0 means no change; larger values will increase contrast.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Integer, between 0 and width of the image.
Integer, between 0 and height of the image.
The width of the cropped image.
Integer, between 1 and the width of the image minus xorigin.
The height of the cropped image.
Integer, between 1 and the height of the image minus yorigin.

tr.td: Integer, representing an ARGB color with 8 bits per channel. May be created using T:Android.Graphics._Color class.
Integer, representing an ARGB color with 8 bits per channel. May be created using T:Android.Graphics._Color class.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Float, between 0 and 1. Zero means no change.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Float, between 0 and 1. Zero means no distortion.

Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: The strength of the grain effect.
Float, between 0 and 1. Zero means no change.

Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Multiple center points (x, y) of the red eye regions.
An array of floats, where (f[2*i], f[2*i+1]) specifies the center of the i'th eye. Coordinate values are expected to be normalized between 0 and 1.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: The angle of rotation in degrees.
Integer value. This will be rounded to the nearest multiple of 90.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Float, between -1 and 1. 0 means no change, while -1 indicates full desaturation, i.e. grayscale.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Float, between 0 and 1. 0 means no change.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Float, between 0 and 1, with 0 indicating cool, and 1 indicating warm. A value of of 0.5 indicates no change.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

tr.td: Integer, representing an ARGB color with 8 bits per channel. May be created using T:Android.Graphics._Color class.

tr.td: Float, between 0 and 1. 0 means no change.
